infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Citadel uses your location to mark attendance when you are at the office.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Citadel requires background location access to automatically detect office entry and exit for attendance.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Citadel uses your location even when the app is closed to enable geofencing-based attendance.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Citadel needs access to your camera to take photos for profile pictures and document uploads.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Citadel needs access to your photo library to select photos for profile pictures and document uploads.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Citadel needs permission to save photos to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Face ID is used to securely authenticate you.

NSLocationTemporaryUsageDescriptionDicti.attendance: Your location is needed to verify you are at the office for attendance.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Citadel to access your location while using the app.
plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Citadel to access your location in the background for attendance tracking.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow Citadel to access your location even when the app is closed.

plugins.faceIDPermission: Allow Citadel to use Face ID for secure authentication.

plugins.photosPermission: Citadel needs access to your photo library to select photos for profile pictures and document uploads.
plugins.cameraPermission: Citadel needs access to your camera to take photos for profile pictures and document uploads.
